# ino-button

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | Type                                           | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `autoFocus` | `autofocus` | Sets the autofocus for this element.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | `boolean \| undefined`                         | `undefined` |
| `dense`     | `dense`     | Makes the button text and container slightly smaller.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | `boolean`                                      | `false`     |
| `disabled`  | `disabled`  | Disables this element.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | `boolean \| undefined`                         | `undefined` |
| `form`      | `form`      | The form id this element origins to.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | `string \| undefined`                          | `undefined` |
| `loading`   | `loading`   | Shows an infinite loading spinner and prevents further clicks.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `boolean \| undefined`                         | `undefined` |
| `name`      | `name`      | The name of the element.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | `string \| undefined`                          | `undefined` |
| `type`      | `type`      | The type of this form. Can either be `button`, `submit` or `reset`.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit" \| undefined` | `'button'`  |
| `variant`   | `variant`   | The button variant. _ **filled**: Contain actions that are important for your application. _ **outlined**: Buttons with medium highlighting. They contain actions that are important but are not the main action in an app. \* **text**: Typically used for less prominent actions, including those in dialogs and cards. | `"filled" \| "outlined" \| "text"`             | `'filled'`  |

## Slots

| Slot              | Description                  |
| ----------------- | ---------------------------- |
| `"icon-leading"`  | For the icon to be prepended |
| `"icon-trailing"` | For the icon to be appended  |
